original_title: 朝のゴミ捨て場ですれ違うノーブラ奥さん 由來ちとせ
overview: "Miyu" was lonely every night because her husband was busy with work and there was no husband and wife. Okumura, a freeter, was looking forward to seeing her 'floating bra' at the garbage dump. One day, by chance, they start a conversation, and the distance between the two approaches rapidly. Even though she knows it's a bad thing, she can't control her feelings for him, and crosses a line that shouldn't be crossed...
title: I Always Pass By This No-Bra Housewife In The Morning When I Take Out The Garbage Miyu
